common.brand_value_definition_text: Brand value is an important indicator of a project's influence and credibility on social media. It reflects real users' attention, discussion intensity, and overall positive sentiment toward the project.
common.brand_value_formula: Brand Value = User Attention Ã— Discussion Heat Ã— Sentiment Orientation Ã— Influence Spread
